post.body: only explanation i can think of cuz that ish is bugged. You might have to bring back snuffing folks for 09 just to be sure.
just damn at your updates. Big things gotta be brewing if you catchin that much BS.
now if only Epson could get the same thing going I'd be in heaven
listening to your rant about the anniversary dinner. Secretly pulling for you guys to get that morning spot man.
pure comedy. 30 Rock is definitely the best on TV right about now.
wear your gun license as a name tag ;-)
joining the iPhone nation?
wurd where?
can a jig get a plate?
Giving you the side eye cuz no matter where you stand you still ain't shit.
Who has a dinner party for a group bigger than 6 and not have it at a place with a private room? Seriously WTF?!
On time for dinner for the first time in a hot minute. You know my ass is hungry.
Substitute the kid fresh out of juvi for your standard downsy Walmart greeter and you got the same cast of idiots. Laundry in the hood. 0_o
sleep overs are for kids
Sitting here listening to this broad put my bass completely out of tune. This is why I never take it down when company comes around.
bumping the late great Mr Hayes live at Wattstax...damn near forgot how tight of a groove these dude could lock in.
pay me my money down
Shooting on a Sunday only makes sense if grub is provided after. The itis got me looking for a pillow and a quiet spot.
Getting drunk before you get there is the only solution to a wack ass DJ. I blame the Fn Williamsburg hipsters for this mornings hangover.
Genius move = putting your barbershop down in the train station! Church Ave stop on the 2 if you think I'm joking.
